definitions.definition: A summer constellation of the northern sky, said to resemble a swan . It includes the triple star system HD 188753 and the stars Deneb and Albireo .
A king of the Ligurians and relative of Phaeton who was transformed into a swan and placed in the sky as a constellation.

main_definition: ( astronomy ) A summer constellation of the northern sky, said to resemble a swan . It includes the triple star system HD 188753 and the stars Deneb and Albireo .
secondary_definitions: ( Greek mythology ) A king of the Ligurians and relative of Phaeton who was transformed into a swan and placed in the sky as a constellation.
